languages.text: "Ваши особые слуги, носящие знания времен осквернения Кьявы Гамма, подвержены болезни в той же мере, что и все прочие. Они заверили, что болезнь не имеет отношения к Губительным силам и происходит из ксеноистока".

"Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."
languages.original_text: "Ваши особые слуги, носящие знания времен осквернения Кьявы Гамма, подвержены болезни в той же мере, что и все прочие. Они заверили, что болезнь не имеет отношения к Губительным силам и происходит из ксеноистока".

languages.text: “您的专业仆人知道基亚瓦伽马星先前被亵渎的事情，而这些人和其他人一样容易被这种疾病感染。但他们向我保证，这种疾病与毁灭之力无关，而是源于异形。”
languages.original_text: "Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."

traits.locale_text: “您的专业仆人知道基亚瓦伽马星先前被亵渎的事情，而这些人和其他人一样容易被这种疾病感染。但他们向我保证，这种疾病与毁灭之力无关，而是源于异形。”
“您的专业仆人知道基亚瓦伽马星先前被亵渎的事情，而这些人和其他人一样容易被这种疾病感染。但他们向我保证，这种疾病与毁灭之力无关，而是源于异形。”

languages.text: «Sus sirvientes especialistas, que tienen conocimiento de la profanación previa de Kiava Gamma son tan susceptibles a la enfermedad como cualquier otra persona. Me han asegurado que la enfermedad no tiene nada que ver con los Poderes Ruinosos y que tiene origen xenos».
languages.original_text: "Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."

traits.locale_text: «Sus sirvientes especialistas, que tienen conocimiento de la profanación previa de Kiava Gamma son tan susceptibles a la enfermedad como cualquier otra persona. Me han asegurado que la enfermedad no tiene nada que ver con los Poderes Ruinosos y que tiene origen xenos».

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマへの以前の冒涜に関する知識を持つあなたの専門従者も、他の者と同様に、この病気にかかりやすいでしょう。彼らはこの病気が〈禍つ神々〉とは無関係で、ゼノ由来だと断言しています」
languages.original_text: "Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマへの以前の冒涜に関する知識を持つあなたの専門従者も、他の者と同様に、この病気にかかりやすいでしょう。彼らはこの病気が〈禍つ神々〉とは無関係で、ゼノ由来だと断言しています」
「キアヴァ・ガンマへの以前の冒涜に関する知識を持つあなたの専門従者も、他の者と同様に、この病気にかかりやすいでしょう。彼らはこの病気が〈禍つ神々〉とは無関係で、ゼノ由来だと断言しています」

languages.text: « Vos serviteurs spécialisés, qui ont connaissance de la précédente profanation de Kiava Gamma, ne sont pas moins vulnérables à la maladie que quiconque. Ils affirment que le mal n'a aucun lien avec les Puissances de la Ruine et serait d'origine xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."

traits.locale_text: « Vos serviteurs spécialisés, qui ont connaissance de la précédente profanation de Kiava Gamma, ne sont pas moins vulnérables à la maladie que quiconque. Ils affirment que le mal n'a aucun lien avec les Puissances de la Ruine et serait d'origine xénos. »

languages.text: "Eure spezialisierten Diener, die von der früheren Entweihung auf Kiava Gamma wissen, sind ebenso anfällig für die Krankheit wie jeder andere. Sie haben mir versichert, dass die Krankheit nichts mit den Mächten der Zerstörung zu tun hat, sondern von einer Xenos-Quelle stammt."
languages.original_text: "Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."

traits.locale_text: "Eure spezialisierten Diener, die von der früheren Entweihung auf Kiava Gamma wissen, sind ebenso anfällig für die Krankheit wie jeder andere. Sie haben mir versichert, dass die Krankheit nichts mit den Mächte der Zerstörung zu tun hat, sondern von einer Xenos-Quelle stammt."

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'ya yapılan saygısızlığa dair malumatı olan özel hizmetkârlarınız, diğer herkes gibi hastalıktan etkilenmeye yatkın. Hastalığın Yıkıcı Güçler'le ilintisi olmadığını ve zenolardan geldiğini söylüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Your special servants, who bear knowledge of the prior desecration of Kiava Gamma, are as susceptible to the disease as any other person. They have assured me the disease has nothing to do with the Ruinous Powers and comes from a xenos source."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'ya yapılan saygısızlığa dair malumatı olan özel hizmetkârlarınız, diğer herkes gibi hastalıktan etkilenmeye yatkın. Hastalığın Yıkıcı Güçler'le ilintisi olmadığını ve zenolardan geldiğini söylüyorlar."
